official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to permit certain types of assistance to religious educational institutions and the students who attend them.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that it shall not be deemed an establishment of religion if the Congress or any State provides for tax credits to the parents of children attending schools operated by religious societies, provides nonreligions educational materials to such schools or to the children attending them, or provides nonreligious auxiliary services to such children.
